page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT-PASTIMES
page.content: Our favourite pastimes include watching T.V.and films,reading and listening to pop music.Most of us enjoy adventure and action T.V. programmes such as Knight Rider,about a man called Michael Knight and his car K.I.T.T which can speak and perform amazing feats.Together they solve crimes.Similar programmes are Street Hawk,The A Team and Blue Thunder.We also like cartoons and weekly series like Dallas,Dynasty and Coronation Street.Programmes for children such as Blue Peter,Newsround,Gentle Ben,Grange Hill are on from 4:00-6:00pm.From 6:00 until 9:00pm is family viewing.After 9:00pm it is adults viewing.
